discoverClub.clubQuote: Spend an unforgettable evening with us…
discoverClub.clubIntroOne: Lovers of an erotic show on the pole will get their money's worth in our Strip & Table Dance Club. Let yourself be enchanted by our beautiful exotic dancers, who provide entertainment either on the large show stage or up close on the dance poles directly on the table.
discoverClub.clubIntroTwo: The sexy dancers will be happy to take you to one of our private rooms for a hot private show that will be really erotic.
discoverClub.clubIntroThree: The Crystal Club & Lounge leaves nothing to be desired and creates the right party atmosphere. Also ideal for bachelor parties.

join.contOne: While we don't always have open positions, we're eager to connect with unique, dynamic individuals who would thrive in our lively environment.
join.contTwo: We’re a small, female-led team of creative, fun-loving women, working in a charming Edwardian townhouse. Our workplace is built on fairness—we don’t charge house fees, discourage tipping the management, and we don’t have a ‘housemom’.
join.contThree: If you’d like to be part of our crew, please fill out the form below and upload three photos along with your resume (if you have one).
join.contFour: We request one clear, recent headshot and another that shows your body proportions, though it doesn’t need to be in swimwear or lingerie. Avoid retouched images, as we prefer to see the real you.
join.contFive: In the ‘About You’ section, feel free to share any relevant experience, background, or interests.
join.contSix: Answer the questions as honestly as you can—whether brief or detailed, there’s no right or wrong. We’re just looking to get a sense of who you are. Don’t be afraid to show your humor, personality, or unique perspective.
join.contSeven: If we think you’d be a good fit, we’ll contact you for an interview, followed by a trial period when a position opens up. We don't hold auditions.
join.contEight: You’ll hear from us via email within 7 days.
join.contNine: For non-entertainer inquiries, please send your CV and a recent photo to crystalclub@gmail.com
join.guest: Any existing guest relationships you'll bring with you?
join.expectSalary: How much do you expect (hope) to earn in a month?
join.superPower: What would your superpower be and why?
join.heardAboutThis: How did you hear about us?

contactUs.contactUsQuote: Requests for reservations, group reservations, bachelor parties or booking inquiries. We are happy to help you.
contactUs.name: Name

footer.addressValue: Crystal Club & Lounge Sandbuehlstrasse 6 8604 Volketswil Switzerland
